TopicTitle: Kerbalizer- How do I put the kerbals into KSP?

Articles.Content:
I made 2 kerbals:

http://imgur.com/nJ6qFaB,9Gd3Nxq#1

and http://imgur.com/nJ6qFaB,9Gd3Nxq.

How do I put them into KSP?
You can't, it's just for making a picture (I cropped and resized mine to make my avatar picture).

You can't.

So, I made those kerbals for nothing? I was positive I could put kerbalizer kerbals into KSP!

We've always said that we want to add the ability to use your Kerbalizer kerbal in game. While that feature is currently not available, it's still on the books as a future wishlist item.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

So, I made those kerbals for nothing? I was positive I could put kerbalizer kerbals into KSP!

You made them for pictures of your personalized kerbals... make an avatar out of it or something. It's a free 'paperdoll' app... I just bought it though cause you reminded me about it.

So, I made those kerbals for nothing? I was positive I could put kerbalizer kerbals into KSP!

Pretty much.

I think there was some plan to make the kerbalizer create portable models, but I have no idea if it's still part of the grand plan.
I too made an awesome kerbanaut, but now i found out i can't really put them in to KSP . They should make it possible.

Please do not revive old threads.

Thread closed.
